channel.title: Possible to make a resizable RS Client?
channel.description:
Possible to make a resizable RS Client?
You know what I mean right? A RuneScape Java app that you can resize so you can make RS full screen if you like or whatever. This would be a great edition to the forums if someone came up with it. It seems conceivable to me, but since I don't know java, I can't help. :(
Any ideas or comments? Please post.

item.title: Possible to make a resizable RS Client?
item.dc:creator: @Freddy1990 Freddy1990
item.description:
@Freddy1990 wrote:

Jagex should make their client open source like second life

Read full topic
item.source: Possible to make a resizable RS Client?

item.title: Possible to make a resizable RS Client?
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Ron:

Why can’t Jagex just release their own client? Would make things a lot easier.

Make it and get a bunch of people to use it and then bitch about it in a bunch of forums untill Jagex adds it as a new “Feature”. It worked for World Switching in the client, man. Though it did take Jagex fucking years.

Read full topic

item.title: Possible to make a resizable RS Client?
item.dc:creator: @pplsuqbawlz pplsuqbawlz
item.description:
@pplsuqbawlz wrote:

It wouldn’t be hard to release an automatic updating client that did that.

But it would be SERIOUSLY complicated to make it undetected… And I’m talking about resizeable graphical rendering, not resizing an image through dithering like ruler does (pitiful).

Read full topic
item.source: Possible to make a resizable RS Client?

item.title: Possible to make a resizable RS Client?
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“Ron, post:13, topic:112722”]Sooo there isn’t a way to actually make it full screen without the RS screen’s pixels distorting the image? But there is a way to do it using ruler’s nexus iBot? I’ll give ruler’s prog a try just for fun. Thanks for all the comments.[/quote]You’ll probably have to pay for it, heh.

Why are you back anyways, ruler? You can’t seem to leave when you say you won’t return.

Read full topic

item.title: Possible to make a resizable RS Client?
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Sooo there isn’t a way to actually make it full screen without the RS screen’s pixels distorting the image? But there is a way to do it using ruler’s nexus iBot? I’ll give ruler’s prog a try just for fun. Thanks for all the comments.

Read full topic
item.source: Possible to make a resizable RS Client?

item.title: Possible to make a resizable RS Client?
item.dc:creator: @Freddy1990 Freddy1990
item.description:
@Freddy1990 wrote:

The only way I can do that is by grabbing the client’s pixels, then magnifying it and placing it in an imagecontrol and then just route the events to the client, that’s how joewnn somewhat did it, of couse with delphi I can’t just make it add real pixels And my java skills are just getting better, so they won’t help much yet…

Read full topic

ruler, I think we’re talking about rendering more pixels, not guessing them with resizing algorithms.

item.source: Possible to make a resizable RS Client?

item.title: Possible to make a resizable RS Client?
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Bebemycat2:

I forget who did this on Kaitnieks, but they managed to do it, but it didn’t look right, iirc, because the minimap was turned into the main screen also, and you couldn’t see a bit of the right side of the screen.

Pplsuqbawlz maybe, not sure though.

I remember somebody posting that picture and I lol’d because it was in the members area of the game. I don’t have the pic anymore, anyway. I’ll check out the latest client and poke around a bit, I dunno. I’ve tried this before and failed and though I’m alot more comfortable in Java now I haven’t worked with Runescape for a while. I remember using a program called Magic that my dad helped program to magnify Runescape when I used to actually play, using outside software might be alot easier if you just want to play fullscreen or whatever.

Edit: Beaten by mopar :rolleyes: I started typing first

Read full topic

I believe pplsuqbawlz did it back on kaitnieks, but like you said never got it quite right. I recall joewnn releasing one here written in delphi (a swiftswitch type client), it should still be in the 3rd party programs section, I’ll see if I can find it.

Read full topic
